at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.vm

Class CloudPlatformConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.vm.CloudPlatformConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregatedCloudPlatformConfiguration, EC2CloudPlatformConfiguration, LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration, OpenstackCloudPlatformConfiguration

    public abstract class CloudPlatformConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The cloud platform configuration parent abstract class that declares methods necessary for platform management.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setMessageQueueConfiguration

        public void setMessageQueueConfiguration(MessageQueueConfiguration messageQueueConfiguration)
        Sets the message Queue configuration to use by instances of this cloud platform. if not defined, default message queue configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        messageQueueConfiguration - The configuration of the message queue that should be used by the hosts in cloud platform.

      • getMessageQueueConfiguration

        protected MessageQueueConfiguration getMessageQueueConfiguration()
        Gets the instance of message queue configuration that should be used within this cloud platform.
        Returns:

      • getVirtualHost

        public abstract IVirtualHost getVirtualHost(IdManager idManager)
        Gets the new host within the declared platform.
        Parameters:
        isStatic - specifies if the host is static (describes the instance that has longer lifecycle than application running time) or dynamic (the host that should be shut down on application shutdown).
        Returns:
        The management object that allows to operate with the new host.

      • getVirtualHostPool

        public abstract IVirtualHostPool getVirtualHostPool()

      • ensureCommunicationServerRunning

        public AutoCloseable ensureCommunicationServerRunning()
                                               throws Exception
        Ensures that Message Queue is running on this cloud platform
        Returns:
        The Closeable object that allows to shut down the MQ server if the MQ server was started.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • startMessageQueueServer

        protected abstract AutoCloseable startMessageQueueServer(MessageQueueConfiguration communicationConfiguration)
                                                  throws Exception
        Starts Message Queue Server with specified configuration and returns closeable object that allows to shut it down.
        Parameters:
        communicationConfiguration - The message queue configuration of the server that should be started.
        Returns:
        The Closeable instance that allows to shut down server if needed.
        Throws:
        Exception
